DOC.brief_summary: RATIONALE : Studying sample tumor tissue patient cancer laboratory may help doctor learn change occur DNA identify biomarkers related cancer . It may also help doctor predict patient respond treatment . PURPOSE : This research study look biomarkers predict response treatment patient newly diagnose stage III stage IV head neck cancer treat carboplatin , paclitaxel , radiation therapy .
DOC.brief_title: Biomarkers Predicting Response Treatment Patients With Newly Diagnosed Stage III Stage IV Head Neck Cancer Treated With Carboplatin , Paclitaxel , Radiation Therapy
DOC.detailed_description: OBJECTIVES : - Determine gene expression pattern correlate treatment response survival identify use DNA microarrays patient newly diagnose head neck squamous cell carcinoma ( HNSCC ) treat carboplatin , paclitaxel , radiotherapy . - Determine protein expression pattern correlate treatment response survival HNSCC identify use matrix-assisted laser desorption ionization-time-of-flight mass spectrometry ( MALDI-TOFMS ) . - Determine molecular signature human papilloma virus-16 infection determine use DNA microarray MALDI-TOFMS correlate gene protein expression , treatment response , survival . OUTLINE : Tumor tissue sample analyze DNA microarray analysis validate quantitative reverse transcription-polymerase chain reaction ( PCR ) . Protein gene expression pattern analyze laser desorption ionization-time-of-flight mass spectrometry , high performance liquid chromatography , liquid chromatography-tandem mass spectrometry , PCR . Samples also analyze tissue microarray immunohistochemistry .
